name: Lavalval Salamander
text:
1 Tuner + 1+ non-Tuner FIRE monsters
If this card is Synchro Summoned: You can draw 2 cards, then send 2 cards from your hand to the GY, including at least 1 FIRE monster, or, if you do not have any FIRE monster in your hand, reveal your entire hand and shuffle it into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Lavalval Salamander" once per turn. Once per turn: You can banish 1 FIRE monster from your GY; change face-up monsters your opponent controls to face-down Defense Position, up to the number of "Laval" monsters you control.
